channel.title: [508] Davidscape source, {bulby}, NPC Follow in combat [508]
channel.description:
Hey guys i did some TuT`s of NPC follow in combat but nothing works, and my last tutorial i have done step by step give me that error :.\DavidScape\npcs\NPC.java:276: cannot find symbol symbol : class NPCMovement location: class DavidScape.npcs.NPC NPCMovement o = Engine.npcMovement; ^ Note: .\DavidScape\players\objectLoader.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
What i have to do? .Can someone make me a complete "NPC Follow player in combat" Tutorial? Thank you very much. Please help!
Modified: ------------------------------------------------------------------------ Maybe you guys can help me by converting NPC AGRESSION and NPC FOLLOW from zooscape to DavidScape?
Here is zooscape source: http://uppit.com/v/DAXJMGUO

item.description:
@Ownz_Asul wrote:

Hey guys i did some TuT`s of NPC follow in combat but nothing works, and my last tutorial i have done step by step give me that error :.\DavidScape\npcs\NPC.java:276: cannot find symbol
symbol : class NPCMovement
location: class DavidScape.npcs.NPC
NPCMovement o = Engine.npcMovement;
^
Note: .\DavidScape\players\objectLoader.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.

Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

What i have to do? .Can someone make me a complete “NPC Follow player in combat” Tutorial?
Thank you very much. Please help!
